text: hi it's Angela
welcome to tip Tuesday's where every
Tuesday I share with you some of my
favorite home and kitchen tips
this week's tip Tuesday is for all the a
letter about that so for those of you
who like hard-boiled eggs and
soft-boiled egg this tip will help you
peel your eggs faster all EEE is just
some cold water and some baking soda
just cook it and boil your eggs like you
normally would or if you're like me use
an egg cooker right after cooking make
sure to rinse your eggs under cold water
to stop the cooking process and it will
help to remove the egg away from the egg
shell after giving my eggs a good rinse
to remove most of the heat I'll let my
eggs sit in a bowl of cold water for
anywhere between two to five minutes
along with a little bit of baking soda
it doesn't need to be a lot just one to
two teaspoons of baking soda and I
that my eggs feels so much easier I hope
you guys enjoyed today's tip Tuesday
don't forget to try this tip and let me
know how you like it in the comments
below and I will see you guys next time
bye
